# scm_management_interface (Data Source)

ManagementInterface data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "scm_management_interface" "settings_data" {
  id = "c94505fb-9554-4e19-b56d-e6104c908fa7"
}

output "fetched_settings" {
  description = "Fetched Management Interface Settings"
  value       = data.scm_management_interface.settings_data
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) UUID of the resource

### Optional

- `device` (String) The device in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `folder` (String) The folder in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.
- `snippet` (String) The snippet in which the resource is defined

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.

### Read-Only

- `management_interface` (Attributes) Management interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--management_interface))
- `tfid` (String) The Terraform ID.

<a id="nestedatt--management_interface"></a>
### Nested Schema for `management_interface`

Read-Only:

- `mgmt_type` (Attributes) IP type (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--management_interface--mgmt_type))
- `mtu` (Number) MTU
- `permitted_ip` (Attributes List) Permitting IP addresses (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--management_interface--permitted_ip))
- `service` (Attributes) Network services (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--management_interface--service))
- `speed_duplex` (String) Speed and duplex

<a id="nestedatt--management_interface--mgmt_type"></a>
### Nested Schema for `management_interface.mgmt_type`

Read-Only:

- `dhcp_client` (Attributes) Dhcp client

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `dhcp_client` and `static`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--management_interface--mgmt_type--dhcp_client))
- `static` (Attributes) Static

> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `dhcp_client` and `static`. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--management_interface--mgmt_type--static))

<a id="nestedatt--management_interface--mgmt_type--dhcp_client"></a>
### Nested Schema for `management_interface.mgmt_type.dhcp_client`

Read-Only:

- `accept_dhcp_domain` (Boolean) Accept DHCP server provided domain name
- `accept_dhcp_hostname` (Boolean) Accept DHCP server provided hostname
- `send_client_id` (Boolean) Send client ID
- `send_hostname` (Boolean) Send hostname


<a id="nestedatt--management_interface--mgmt_type--static"></a>
### Nested Schema for `management_interface.mgmt_type.static`

Read-Only:

- `default_gateway` (String) Default gateway
- `ip_address` (String) IP address
- `netmask` (String) Netmask



<a id="nestedatt--management_interface--permitted_ip"></a>
### Nested Schema for `management_interface.permitted_ip`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String) Description
- `name` (String) IP address


<a id="nestedatt--management_interface--service"></a>
### Nested Schema for `management_interface.service`

Read-Only:

- `disable_http` (Boolean) HTTP
- `disable_http_ocsp` (Boolean) HTTP OCSP
- `disable_https` (Boolean) HTTPS
- `disable_icmp` (Boolean) Ping
- `disable_snmp` (Boolean) SNMP
- `disable_ssh` (Boolean) SSH
- `disable_telnet` (Boolean) Telnet
- `disable_userid_service` (Boolean) User-ID
- `disable_userid_syslog_listener_ssl` (Boolean) User-ID syslog listener over SSL
- `disable_userid_syslog_listener_udp` (Boolean) User-ID syslog listener over UDP
